general.title: An error occurred
general.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

badRequest.title: Bad Request
badRequest.message: The request was invalid or cannot be served. Please check and try again.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

notFound.title: Resource Not Found
notFound.message: The requested resource could not be found.

notImplemented.title: Not Implemented
notImplemented.message: The requested functionality is not implemented.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You are not authorized to perform this action.

exists.title: Team Already Exists
exists.message: A team with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

notFound.title: Team Not Found
notFound.message: The specified team could not be found.

notFound.title: Team Settings Not Found
notFound.message: The specified team settings could not be found.

userNotConfirmed.title: Account not confirmed
userNotConfirmed.message: Your account is not confirmed. Check your email for a confirmation link.

userNotFound.title: Account not found
userNotFound.message: No account found for that email.

passwordResetRequired.message: A password reset is required. Please reset your password.

tooManyRequests.title: Too many attempts
tooManyRequests.message: Too many attempts. Try again later.

verificationFailed.title: Verification failed
verificationFailed.message: TOTP verification failed, this means the code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

codeMismatch.title: Invalid code.
codeMismatch.message: The code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

expired.title: Code expired.
expired.message: The code has expired. Request a new code and try again.

notAuthorized.title: Not authorized.
notAuthorized.message: You are not authorized to perform this action.

limitExceeded.title: Too many attempts.
limitExceeded.message: Too many attempts. Please wait and try again later.

confirmForgotPassword.title: Invalid code or password
confirmForgotPassword.message: The confirmation code or new password is invalid. Please check and try again.

validation.title: Validation error
validation.message: Confirmation code, password, or username is empty or invalid.

limitExceeded.title: Too many attempts
limitExceeded.message: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying again.

codeMismatch.title: Invalid code
codeMismatch.message: The code you entered is invalid. Please check and try again.

expiredCode.title: Code expired
expiredCode.message: The code has expired. Request a new code to continue.

verificationFailed.title: Verification failed

invalidPassword.title: Invalid password
invalidPassword.message: Password does not meet the required complexity.

codeMismatch.title: Invalid code

expiredCode.title: Code expired
expiredCode.message: The confirmation code has expired. Request a new code to continue.

userNotFound.title: User not found
userNotFound.message: No account found for that email.

exists.title: Invite Already Exists
exists.message: An invite for this email already exists.

invalidToken.title: Invalid Invite Token
invalidToken.message: The invite token is invalid or has already been used.

expired.title: Invite Expired
expired.message: The invite token has expired. Please request a new invite.

alreadyCompleted.title: Invite Already Completed
alreadyCompleted.message: This invite has already been completed.

userAlreadyMember.title: User Already a Member
userAlreadyMember.message: The user is already a member of the team.

created.title: Team Created
created.message: The team has been created successfully.

deleted.title: Team Deleted
deleted.message: The team has been deleted successfully.

accept.title: Invitation
accept.subtitle: You received an invitation link by email. Please enter the email address this invite was sent to and choose to accept or decline the invitation.

complete.memberCreatedMessage: An account was created for you. Use the temporary password to sign in and set a new password.
complete.title: Invite Completed
complete.subtitle: Thank you â€” the invite has been completed successfully.

no_token.title: No Token Provided
no_token.message: No invite token was found in the URL.
no_token.explain: It looks like the invitation link is missing a token. Please check the link in your email or contact the sender to resend the invite.

invalid_token.title: Invalid Token
invalid_token.message: The invite token is invalid or has already been used.
invalid_token.explain: The token in the link doesn't match any pending invitation. This can happen if the link was modified or the invite was already completed. Ask the sender to issue a new invite.

expired_token.title: Invite Expired
expired_token.message: The invite token has expired. Please request a new invite.
expired_token.explain: Invitations are time-limited for security. Ask the team admin to send a new invite or request one again from the application.

already_completed.title: Invite Already Completed
already_completed.message: This invite has already been completed.
already_completed.explain: This invitation was already accepted or declined. If you believe this is a mistake, contact the sender or your team administrator for assistance.

unknown_error.title: Unknown Error
unknown_error.message: An unknown error occurred while processing the invite.
unknown_error.explain: An unexpected error occurred while processing the invitation. Try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

settings.title: Team Settings
settings.noSettings: No settings available for this team.

members.title: Team Members
members.subtitle: Members list will appear here. (Placeholder)
members.placeholder: Team members will be shown here once implemented.

notFoundPage.title: Page not found
notFoundPage.subtitle: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.
notFoundPage.explain: The page you're trying to reach may have been moved or deleted. If you typed the URL directly, please check it and try again.
